orders.name: getOrders
orders.description: Returns orders created or updated during a specified time period. Primary polling endpoint.
orders.use_case: Delta sync: use LastUpdatedAfter = (last_sync_timestamp) to fetch only changed orders.
gotchas: Order line items are NOT included. You must call getOrderItems per order.
Shipping address is NOT included. Call getOrderAddress separately.
Rate limit is very low (0.0167 req/sec). For high-volume sellers, consider the Reports API instead.

orders.name: getOrder
orders.description: Returns details for a single order by Amazon order ID.
orders.use_case: Fetch a single order by ID (e.g. from a webhook or reference). Format: 114-1234567-1234567.

orders.name: getOrderItems
orders.description: Returns detailed order line items for a given order ID.
orders.use_case: Must be called separately for every order — line items are never included in getOrders.
gotchas: A single order can have multiple pages of items. Always paginate.

orders.name: getOrderAddress
orders.description: Returns the shipping address for the specified order.
orders.use_case: Retrieve the buyer's shipping address for fulfillment processing.

catalog.name: searchCatalogItems
catalog.description: Search the Amazon catalog by keyword, ASIN, UPC, EAN, or ISBN.
catalog.use_case: Look up product data by barcode (UPC/EAN) or keyword. Use identifiersType=EAN for catalog matching.

catalog.name: getCatalogItem
catalog.description: Retrieves full catalog details for a known ASIN.
catalog.use_case: Enrich product data when you already have the ASIN.

catalog.name: putListingsItem
catalog.description: Creates or fully replaces a seller listing. Requires a complete product data body.
catalog.use_case: Create a new listing or fully update an existing one. Use PATCH for partial updates.
gotchas: PUT replaces the entire listing. Missing attributes will be cleared.

catalog.name: patchListingsItem
catalog.description: Partially updates a seller listing using JSON Patch operations.
catalog.use_case: Update specific fields (e.g. price, quantity) without resending the full listing.

catalog.name: deleteListingsItem
catalog.description: Deletes a seller listing by seller SKU.
catalog.use_case: Remove a product from a marketplace listing.

inventory.name: getInventorySummaries
inventory.description: Returns FBA inventory summaries: available, reserved, unfulfillable quantities.
inventory.use_case: Retrieve FBA stock levels per SKU. Use startDateTime for delta sync.
gotchas: FBA (Fulfilled by Amazon) inventory only. For FBM stock, update via patchListingsItem (quantity attribute).
The 'details' flag must be set to true to get inbound/reserved breakdowns.

fulfillment.name: createFulfillmentOrder
fulfillment.description: Requests Amazon to ship FBA inventory to a non-Amazon destination (Multi-Channel Fulfillment).
fulfillment.use_case: Fulfill orders from other channels (your website, eBay, etc.) using Amazon FBA stock.

fulfillment.name: getFulfillmentOrder
fulfillment.description: Returns status and tracking for an MCF fulfillment order.
fulfillment.use_case: Poll fulfillment status and extract tracking numbers once status is COMPLETE.

fulfillment.name: cancelFulfillmentOrder
fulfillment.description: Cancels a fulfillment order if it hasn't been shipped yet.
fulfillment.use_case: Cancel an MCF order before it ships. Returns an error if the order is already shipped.

reports.name: createReport
reports.description: Requests generation of an async report. Returns a reportId to poll.
reports.use_case: Preferred for bulk data exports. Use instead of per-item API calls for datasets >500 items.

reports.name: getReport
reports.description: Returns report metadata and processing status.
reports.use_case: Poll with exponential backoff until status is DONE. Then call getReportDocument.

reports.name: getReportDocument
reports.description: Returns a pre-signed S3 URL to download the report file.
reports.use_case: Download the report via the returned URL. URL expires after 5 minutes — download immediately.
gotchas: The download URL expires in 5 minutes. Do not store the URL, download immediately.

returns.name: listReturnReasonCodes
returns.description: Returns the valid return reason codes for a seller SKU in a marketplace.
returns.use_case: Fetch valid reason codes before creating a return authorization.

returns.name: createReturnItem
returns.description: Creates a return item request for a fulfilled order.
returns.use_case: Initiate a return for a delivered order. Returns a RMA number.
